entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
